statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ -3 \\ -5 \\ 3 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 39 \\ 6 \\ 11 \\ -9 \\ 19 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
